@ Taliyuna....They were asking if multiplayer was removed (ripped) because being that this IS the Pirate Bay multiplayer usually can't be accessed therefore it is a waste of bandwidth and drive space.  This is what RIP means in torrent land. It means something has been removed from the files to save space, usually languages other than english and multiplayer.
